00076 inline TypeRegistry::const_iterator TypeRegistry::begin() const
00077 {
00078         return tfmap_.begin();
00079 }
00080 
00081 inline TypeRegistry::const_iterator TypeRegistry::end() const
00082 {
00083         return tfmap_.end();

00086 #if 0
00087 template<typename Func>
00088 bool TypeRegistry::traverseBaseTypes(const TypeDesc &start, Func functor) const
00089 {
00090         for (StringList::const_iterator i=start->base_type_names.begin(); i!=start->base_type_names.end(); ++i)
00091         {
00092                 const TypeDesc *td = findTypeDescription(*i);
00093                 if (!td)
00094                 {
00095                         Notify::warn("could not find description of type `" + *i + "' during traverseBaseTypes()");
00096                 }
00097                 else
00098                 {
00099                         if (!functor(*td))
00100                                 return false;
00101                 }
00102         }
00103         return true;
00104 }
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 inline void TypeRegistry::registerSymbol(const std::string &s)
00108 {
00109         symbols_.insert(s);
00110 }
00111 
00112 inline bool TypeRegistry::symbolExists(const std::string &s) const
00113 {
00114         return symbols_.find(s) != symbols_.end();
00115 }
